name: Dreampoint Collapse
description:
Controls:

Move - Arrow Keys or WASD

Jump - Up or W

Pause - Enter or Escape

Create Block - Left Mouse Button

Dreampoint Collapse is a puzzle platformer created for Ludum Dare 49. The player creates blocks that their character can jump on to complete the levels. Because the theme was "Unstable," the blocks you create disappear after the character touches them. I made everything in this game myself except for a few open source fonts. I hope you enjoy playing!
